these faces that he found so tedious, none seemed to bore him so much as that of his pretty wife. He turned away from her with a grimace that distorted his handsome face, kissed Anna Pdvlovna's hand, and screwing up his eyes scanned the whole company. 
"You are off to the war, Prince?" said Anna Pdvlovna. 
"General Kutuzov," said Bolk6nski, speak- ing French and stressing the last syllable of the general's name like a Frenchman, "has been pleased to take me as an aide-de-camp. . . ."
